title: Textile, 1960-79-16, mid–late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: copperplate printed on plain weave
description: Plate printed in red in a design showing a man and woman dressed in eighteenth century garments. The man is seated in front of a house and beside him is a box of tools. Woman is looking out of the entrance door. Scene is set within large scale garlands of birds, flowers and fruit.
